  • Résumé

    You can also just find me on LinkedIn.

Professional Design & Development Experience

User Experience Architect; Artisan Technology Group; Kansas City, MO

Current

As the face of user experience at Artisan, I work closely with our partners and clients to improve messaging and strategic tactics throughout their brands and systems. Beginning with market research and in-depth business discovery I organize, plan, design, prototype, and develop custom interfaces and marketing materials for a wide variety of technology applications.

Principal Developer; Intouch Solutions, Inc.; Overland Park, KS

2014 — 2018

I work closely on a daily basis with architects, directors and the VP of Development Services on complex or high-profile projects. I'm an Adobe Experience Manager Certified Expert developer, often acting as liaison with technology vendors and client IT groups. While my primary focus is always implementation and development, I work with architects on documenting standards and mentoring team developers on specific technologies to ensure long-term growth of the business.

Certification: Adobe Experience Manager Expert Developer

Previous titles at Intouch Solutions: Developer, Senior Developer, Development Team Lead, AEM Development Lead

Web Development; Marketing; Softek Solutions, Inc.; Prairie Village, KS

2010 — 2014

Design and development of the websites, social networking and general online presence of SSI with occasional print design when help is needed.

Web Development; Creative Marketing; Liquid Soap Products; Lee’s Summit, MO

2009 — 2010

Design and development of the websites of LSP and it’s subsidiaries; Ultra International and Custom Solutions, Inc. with occasional print design when help is needed.

Designer, Developer and Owner; Boulder Design & Graphics; Independence, MO

2004 — 2011

Design and develop marketing materials as needed by clients from around the world.

Graphic Artist; Creative Services; Fort Dodge Animal Health; Overland Park, KS

2008 — 2009

Designed marketing and sales support materials for Fort Dodge Animal Health and our parent company, Wyeth Pharmaceuticals - almost solely print production.

Graphic Designer; Ad Services; Kansas City Star and KansasCity.com; Kansas City, MO

2005 — 2008

Began designing display ads for placement in the Kansas City Star. Then designed banner ads, forms, widgets, web sites, e-mail blasts, etc. for KansasCity.com and interoffice McClatchy Interactive use.

Digital Retouch Specialist; H & H Color Lab; Raytown, MO

2005

Extensive training and labor in Adobe Photoshop retouching professional photographs

Contracted Designer; Graceland University Athletics; Graceland University; Lamoni, IA

2005

Continued designing several print pieces on demand due to staff preference after leaving the Creative Media Center - led to launch of my own business.

Graphic Designer; Creative Media Center; Graceland University; Lamoni, IA

2004 — 2005

Part- and full-time internship atmosphere learning about presses and design techniques.

Graphic Designer; Acacia, Graceland University Yearbook; Lamoni, IA

2003 — 2004

In charge of layout and photo placement (in Quark) of the yearbook.

Education

2001 — 2005

Graceland University; Lamoni, IA

Bachelor of Arts Degree; Major: Visual Communications; Minor: Psychology

2007 — 2009

Johnson County Community College Center for Business and Technology; Overland Park, KS

Various Continuing Education Certificates

Technical Skills

Proficient in both Mac and PC:

Visual Studio, IntelliJ, Sketch, Adobe Dreamweaver, Flash, Photoshop, Fireworks, Illustrator, InDesign, Final Cut, Google SketchUp, Microsoft Office, Camtasia, etc.

Considerable experience with:

Java, PHP, VBscript, Angular, .NET MVC, javascript, HTML5, CSS3, XML, Maven, mySQL, PostgreSQL, NPM, Gulp, Git, SVN, TFS, Adobe Actionscript, Actions, [Paragraph and Object] Styles
